articles.author: Shannon Grixti
articles.title: PlayStation’s Days Of Play Sale Event Is Back For 2023 With A Great PlayStation Plus Deal - Press Start Australia
articles.description: PlayStation has once again revealed that its Days of Play sale will return for 2023 with deals to be confirmed on June 2nd on the Days of Play website (but we'll have all the Aussie deals here for you throughout the week). In a post on the PlayStation Blog, P…
